name: Canon EOS 5D Mark IV
description: The Canon EOS 5D Mark IV is a full-frame DSLR camera that delivers exceptional image quality and versatility for both stills and video.

name: Nikon D850
description: The Nikon D850 is a full-frame DSLR camera with a remarkable 45.7 MP resolution and excellent dynamic range for stunning detail and color.

name: Sony Alpha a7R IV
description: The Sony Alpha a7R IV is a full-frame mirrorless camera boasting a 61 MP sensor, offering incredible resolution and impressive autofocus performance.
sensor: 61 MP Full-Frame Exmor R BSI CMOS

name: Fujifilm X-T4
description: The Fujifilm X-T4 is a high-performance APS-C mirrorless camera, featuring in-body stabilization and advanced video capabilities.

name: Panasonic Lumix GH5
description: The Panasonic Lumix GH5 is a mirrorless camera with advanced video features and a rugged design, ideal for professional videographers.
sensor: 20.3 MP Micro Four Thirds Live MOS

name: Olympus OM-D E-M1 Mark III
description: The Olympus OM-D E-M1 Mark III is a compact mirrorless camera with impressive in-body stabilization and weatherproof construction, perfect for outdoor photography.
sensor: 20.4 MP Micro Four Thirds Live MOS

name: Leica Q2
description: The Leica Q2 is a premium compact full-frame camera with a fixed 28mm lens, delivering exceptional image quality in a sleek, stylish package.

name: Pentax K-1 Mark II
description: The Pentax K-1 Mark II is a full-frame DSLR known for its rugged design and in-body image stabilization, perfect for outdoor and landscape photography.

name: Sony Alpha a6600
description: The Sony Alpha a6600 is a compact APS-C mirrorless camera with impressive autofocus performance and excellent video capabilities.

name: Nikon Z6 II
description: The Nikon Z6 II is a full-frame mirrorless camera offering high-speed performance, 4K video, and excellent low-light capabilities.
